item.title: Garmin Express on Linux | Step by Step Guide
item.description: This is an installation guide on how to get Garmin Express on Linux working. In this Step by Step Guide, I go over creating a new wine bottle and installing Garmin Express in it. Linux Package Requirements: wine-devel Note:3.19 or higher winetricks Installation Steps First we start by creating a wineprefix and installing our prerequisites from terminal: Note: You will be prompted during the setup for .NET installation just hit next and finish.
